lead_paragraph: A look at the clemency applications of felons who were pardoned reveal that many contained personal appeals from friends of Gov. Haley Barbour and major Republican donors.
snippet: A look at the clemency applications of felons who were pardoned reveal that many contained personal appeals from friends of Gov. Haley Barbour and major Republican donors....

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and STEPHANIE SAUL
byline.contributor: Alain Delaquérière and Lisa Schwartz contributed research.

headline.print_headline: List of Pardons Included Many Tied to Power
headline.main: List of Pardons Included Many Tied to Power
headline.seo: Many Pardon Applicants Stressed Connection to Mississippi Governor

abstract: Analysis of the clemency applications of felons who were pardoned by former Mississippi Gov Haley Barbour reveals that many of them contained personal appeals from friends of Barbour, major Republican donors or others from the higher social strata; 215 pardons issued by Barbour during his last days in office amount to 10 times as many as his four predecessors combined.
